description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Toggle' that wraps the '@radix-ui/react-toggle' primitive, applying custom styling with 'class-variance-authority' and utility functions. It includes styled variants for appearance and size, and exports the component along with styling variants.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Creates a React component that passes its ref to the underlying TogglePrimitive.Root component.

ctags.name: Toggle
ctags.pattern: /^const Toggle = React.forwardRef(({ className, variant, size, ...props }, ref) => ($/
